More examplesFewer examplesThey did not dare to challenge the ideals of parliamentary democracy.The parliamentary session is due to end on 27 May.They accused the government of riding roughshod over parliamentary procedure.This has been one of the most difficult periods of her parliamentary career.parliamentary language
